bibl.title: The Bishop, the Eparch, and the King. Old Nubian Texts from Qasr Ibrim (P. QI IV)

series.title: The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements

bibl.note: P. nub. Qasr Ibrîm IV, 63-124. - Continued from: J.M. Plumley & G.M. Browne, Old Nubian Texts from Qasr Ibrim I = Texts from Excavations. 9 (London, 1988); - G.M. Browne, Old Nubian Texts from Qasr Ibrim II = Texts from Excavations. 10 (London, 1989); - G.M. Browne, Old Nubian Texts from Qasr Ibrim III = Texts from Excavations. 12 (London, 1991). - Introduction: A background to the texts; - Historical commentary; - Linguistic and palaeographical commentary; - A note on the translations and commentary; - Future work. - Old Nubian texts from Qasr Ibrim. - Bibliography. Indices.
bibl.seg: Giovanni R. Ruffini, The Bishop, the Eparch, and the King. Old Nubian Texts from Qasr Ibrim (P. QI IV) = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XXII.
Warsaw, Warsaw University, 2014, 8°, xiv-367 pp., 69 figg. ISBN 978-83-938425-1-3. €77.

P. nub. Qasr Ibrîm IV, 63-124. - Continued from: J.M. Plumley & G.M. Browne, Old Nubian Texts from Qasr Ibrim I = Texts from Excavations. 9 (London, 1988); - G.M. Browne, Old Nubian Texts from Qasr Ibrim II = Texts from Excavations. 10 (London, 1989); - G.M. Browne, Old Nubian Texts from Qasr Ibrim III = Texts from Excavations. 12 (London, 1991). - Introduction: A background to the texts; - Historical commentary; - Linguistic and palaeographical commentary; - A note on the translations and commentary; - Future work. - Old Nubian texts from Qasr Ibrim. - Bibliography. Indices.
C.R. par Vincent W.J. van Gerven Oel, BMCRev < http://bmcr.brynmawr.edu/2015/2015-04-28.html >.
